column2: I awake thinking about the last time we met.  So I get in my car and drive across town so I can wait in line for 30 minutes to an hour
column3: sit inside a tiny little run down building (or outside if I feel like waiting longer)
column4: and anxiously await your return.  Sometimes I like to add jalepenos to you
column7: you are always just as good.  Your friend
column10: is just as delectable.  Green eggs
column12: I can always rely on you to be yummy and make my hangovers go away.
